segments.text: Oh , please ! Don't be so old-fashioned ! It's totally safe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I sure hope you didn't trust anyone with your credit card number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All I did so far was make a bid on the Buddha . It was easy !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Easy ? Ha ! ! It was easy for them to cheat you ! !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on ! I just gave them my e-mail , my address and my phone number . And my name , of course .
segments.speaker: S1
